name: RythmWave
description:
Les Bidets Joyeux presents... Rythmwave !

Meet Dave, a little creative boy who is living in a 2D world. And he's got some sort of magic in his mind. That right, when he listen to synthwave music, he can now imagine a complete new world... a 3D world !

"Hey ! I'm Dave !"

Play to this rythm game by using the numeric panel and their 9 buttons ! (you can also use letters on the keyboard, but numeric panel is recommended for a better experience)

"You seem pretty groovy, aren't you ?"

Controls in menu :
2, 4, 6, 8 (c, d, g, r) : Navigate in menu
1, 3 (x, v) : change notes speed
5, 0 (f, space) : Confirm, back

Dev Team :

Game Design : Enzo Benedetti, Thomas Hébert

Game Art : Louna Roux, Alexane Béguin
